data.title: My Tribute to Sir Michael Caine CBE
data.meta_description: My Tribute to Sir Michael Caine CBE / Maurice Micklewhite / Transformed himself becoming /.  Published at the web's largest poetry site.
data.text:
Maurice Micklewhite

Transformed himself becoming

Michael Caine actor extraordinaire

Knighted by Queen Elizabeth the Second

For services to the Cinema.

His latest film "The Great Escaper"

Pays tribute to a World War II veteran

Who "broke out" of his care home

In 2014 to pay tribute to his

Fallen comrades in France.

Sir Michael scotched rumours of

His imminent retirement explaining

In January 2024 he embarks on a project

About Charles Darwin

Which is eagerly anticipated.

Matt29 - This Rose is a lovely poem celebrating the amazing man Michael Caine is. How he has now reached the grand age of 90. Staring in his last film the great escaper as a world war two veteran who broke out of a retirement home in 2014 to pat tribute to his lost comrades in France. Amazing poem to a great actor thanks for entering

on Oct 23 2023 04:07 AM PST edit
